item.title: A New Road Safety Group Targets Self-Driving Cars
item.description: A Tesla Takedown alum has launched a campaign for stricter regulation of autonomous vehicles in the US.

item.title: What Is Google One? A Breakdown of Plans, Pricing, and Included Services
item.description: If you use Google’s apps and AI, it’s worth looking at this all-inclusive service. We break down the plans and how much they cost.

item.title: When Face Recognition Doesn’t Know Your Face Is a Face

item.title: Waymo's Robotaxis Are Coming to London

item.title: Waymo plans to launch a robotaxi service in London in 2026
item.description: Waymo already has ties to the UK, which began after the autonomous vehicle technology company acquired Latent Logic in 2019.
